definition[0]: a piece of thin material that is stuck to the skin to cover cuts and other small wounds

example[0]: This idea is criticized by some as a Band-Aid solution.
definition[2]: an organization set up by Bob Geldof in 1984 to collect money for people dying of hunger in Ethiopia. This was done by getting many famous popular musicians to make a record together called Do They Know It's Christmas?, and by organizing the  Live Aid concerts in London and Philadelphia.
